reviews.review: 拖了很久才通关，创意独一无二
Do I have to explain why Half Life 2 is good?
Very good many shooting and i die lots
Great story line and impressive gameplay. got this so i would be ready for alyx and its just making me more exited to play alyx.
god i cant stop screaming at the headcrabs

The best shooter that has ever existed, and is a candidate for the best game ever. Great graphics for the time, and a great story. And the gameplay is the best both in the shootings (with the different possibilities that the game offers you), and in the different moments of the story (certain gun that moves objects, the moment of "the ground is lava", the part of conduction...). An authentic timeless classic.
El mejor juego, sin duda .Una revolución para su época.
Buenardo, mucho mejor que el primero.
One of the best single player shooters for sure. Most, if not, all games Valve puts out are amazing, and this one is no different.

If you like shooters with rich story and some zombies you'll love this.
It will surely keep you at the edge of your seat!
my favorite game in the world
Flawless gameplay, ground breaking mechanics , deep world-building, and a giant robot dog.
it is an amazing game. nothing else to say.

Alright. Im about 16 years late to the conversation, but holy crap. This IS my favorite game. The half life series has left me in awe, Obviously this game is immensely different in both visuals, story and characters (Half life 1 doesnt really have characters), half life 2 excellently builds and creates story on what Half life 1 lacks. This is a good game.
这个操蛋游戏玩一下就晕
A fun FPS starring everyone's favorite murdering physicist Dr. Gordon Freeman!
The head crabs are kinda cute 0_0
oynanış leziz hikaye süper daha ne olsun arkadaş
Fantastic game, truly a great followup to half-life

Pros:
You can play with the Dog

Cons:
Dog isn't actually a dog
su historia y jugavilidad, son muy buenas, su ambientacion y expresiones faciales lo hacen muy inmersivo
Однозначно легендарная игра, которая изменила индустрию во многом, но в последней версии игры есть баги. У меня вылетает игра уже в четвертый раз на одном и том же моменте, игра просто сломана.

This game is free now which is basically robbing the game. This game must be played by everyone who has steam. If you haven't played this game then you have not played a key piece of video game history.

Personally one of my favorite games of all time, and by far my second favorite Half-Life game, second only to blue shift (see my review on that for why).  Unfortunately I have failed to beat the game sense the first ever time I did so (years ago now), with the release of Half-Life: Alyx, I am getting back into these games, so that the story is fresh in my head when I pick up where the story last dropped off.  To me, an easy 10/10.

JUEGAZO!!!!
bajos requisitos, rejugabilidad y barato! jaja
I thought Half-life 1 was better, the "rebel alliance" aspect was a bit annoying, however the blue gravity gun was fun as hell

Great sequel to the original Half-Life game realeased in 1998. The polygons and the engine, the graphics and the physics are great and much more developed like you can tell.
I would recommend this game like the other Half-Life games.
I would say its a 87% must buy.

Estou jogando pela primeira vez na minha vida e posso dizer com firmeza que esse é um dos melhores jogos já feitos na historia, tem um perfeito balanceamento de ação com historia, com a perfeita execução dos dois.

Sem falar na troca de cenário dando sempre um clima novo com inimigos relacionados a tal, tudo fluido e misturado com a historia que implementa toda a experiência.

Esse jogo é um prato cheio de sabores incríveis!
I loved how it perfectly blended great gameplay, story, and graphics to make an overall great game.
es lo mas hermoso jamas creado
Jogo muito bom, no sentido de qualidade gráficas, mas também na história.
2004 yılında Half Life 2 gibi mükemmel işler başarabilen Valve'nin şu andaki tek vasvının CSGO'ya güncelleme getirmesi çok üzücü...
Jeu sympa pour le confinement mais il y a mieux, même pour un jeu de 2004.
Hikaye zaten süper bence al düşünme amk

Absolutely incredible game and one of the best I've ever played, Half-Life 2 is a very important game and it still holds up to this day. While I slightly prefer the atmosphere of the first game, I prefer the story of the second. I can't decide which I like better between Half-Life and Half-Life 2.
Best of fps games salute HL Series...

Legendary game that impacted the whole industrys standards back in 2004. 10/10 writing, 10/10 characters, 10/10 mechanics, one of those games that make me soyface when its mentioned.

lambda locator/10
你们真的都一点也不晕吗？？？
It´s godamm best shooter game ever!!!!
I loved this game so much! This is definitely one of the best games I played after Assassins Creed and Watch Dogs. I can't describe it in words but this is an amazing game recommend it to everyone.
